founders.title: Founders
founders.subtitle: The Team Behind HENQ
founders.description: Meet the visionaries who brought HENQ Technologies to life.

journey.title: Our Journey
journey.paragraph1: HENQ Technologies was founded with a simple yet ambitious vision: to bridge the gap between cutting-edge technology and practical business solutions. Our founders bring together decades of experience in software development, artificial intelligence, and business strategy.
journey.paragraph2: We believe that the future belongs to those who can harness technology not just to solve today's problems, but to anticipate tomorrow's opportunities. That's why we're committed to continuous innovation and pushing the boundaries of what's possible.

nikolaiBockholt.name: Nikolai Bockholt
nikolaiBockholt.bio: Technology expert with 9.5 years of experience at Google as a Creative Technologist. Specialist in innovative software development and digital transformation.

tobiasNisse.name: Tobias Nisse
tobiasNisse.bio: Former professional soldier and hunter with strong business acumen. Focus on strategic planning, scalable solutions, and sustainable business development.

news.title: News

moreNewsComing.title: More News Coming Soon
moreNewsComing.description: We're working on expanding our news section with regular updates about our projects, research, and industry insights. Stay tuned for more content!

companyFounding.title: HENQ Technologies Founded: Vision for the Future of Intelligent Technologies
companyFounding.excerpt: We are excited to announce the founding of HENQ Technologies – an innovative technology company with the mission to transform businesses through intelligent AI solutions and tailored cloud infrastructures.
companyFounding.content: The founders Nikolai Bockholt, former Creative Technologist at Google with 9.5 years of experience, and Tobias Nisse, former professional soldier and successful businessman, combine technical excellence with strategic business acumen. Together, they pursue the vision of making cutting-edge AI technologies and cloud solutions accessible and efficient for companies of all sizes.

pixelRevive.title: PixelRevive.app Launched: Generative AI Brings Old Photos Back to Life
pixelRevive.excerpt: HENQ Technologies presents PixelRevive.app – a revolutionary web-based application that restores old and damaged photos to impressive quality using generative AI technologies.
pixelRevive.content: The platform utilizes cutting-edge Large Language Models and Computer Vision algorithms to automatically remove scratches, reconstruct colors, and restore original sharpness. PixelRevive.app makes professional photo restoration accessible to everyone and impressively demonstrates the potential of generative AI in the creative field.

phoneAI.title: Breakthrough in Phone AI: Natural Conversations Through Advanced LLM Technology
phoneAI.excerpt: HENQ Technologies is working on a groundbreaking B2B phone AI solution that ushers in a new era of customer communication through the use of cutting-edge Large Language Models.
phoneAI.content: The innovative system enables natural, context-aware conversations that fundamentally differ from conventional automated phone systems. Through the integration of advanced speech processing, interactions emerge that are as fluid and understanding as those previously known only from human conversation partners.

seo.defaultTitle: HENQ Technologies GbR - Innovative Technology Solutions from Germany

banner.title: Cookie Settings
banner.description: We use cookies to provide you with the best possible experience on our website. Some are necessary for functionality, others help us improve the website and show you relevant content.

settings.title: Cookie Settings
settings.description: Here you can manage your cookie preferences. You can change your settings at any time by clicking on the cookie settings link in the footer.

necessary.title: Necessary Cookies
necessary.description: These cookies are essential for the basic functionality of the website and cannot be disabled. They do not store any personally identifiable information.

statistics.title: Statistics Cookies
statistics.description: These cookies help us understand how visitors interact with our website by collecting and reporting information anonymously. We use Google Analytics with IP anonymization.

functional.title: Functional Cookies
functional.description: These cookies enable enhanced functionality and personalization, such as remembering your language preference and other settings.

marketing.title: Marketing Cookies
marketing.description: These cookies are used to show you relevant advertising. They may also be used to limit the number of ads and measure the effectiveness of advertising campaigns.
